ISSUE.TITLE: nop_commerce_web failed to start
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi all, nopCommerce version: branch: develop Steps to reproduce the problem: I did run: `docker-compose up -d` and I obtained two running containers. The DB container works well, while the main application container shuts itself off after few seconds returning error 139 in Docker. The error output I get is the following: > Unhandled exception.
